title: Infernal Creature Vocalizations
description: Infernal Creature Vocalizations sound package with 224 high-quality monster sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral voice sounds, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/infernal-creature-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/36bpk0dhk5fgw95/MSE%20-%20Infernal%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


The Infernal Creature is a small to medium-sized monster in the service of the forces of Darkness. It has a whistling otherworldly sound in its voice. It dwells in the bowels of hell near caves and ruins, feeding on carrion and remains.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 15 voice actions, including 224 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 24 voice sounds during an attack
  • 8 battle shouts
  • 12 bite and yelp sounds
  • 28 deaths
  • 4 exert and effort sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 32 growls
  • 8 idle and speech sounds
  • 12 sounds of jumping and action
  • 4 laughs
  • 24 pains
  • 32 roars
  • 8 snarling sounds
  • 12 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 8 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs. 


This package is ideal for creating small and medium-sized monster voices: demon, devil, undead, necromancer, mutant, parasite, alien, troglodyte and more. 


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 224 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 15 voice actions
  • 124 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 60 voice samples of the pain type
  • 40 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 224

Number of Audio Cues: 224

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 04 minutes 50 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
